titleStmt.title: B────h's Exultation upon hearing that his Fame
would be transmitted to Posterity in the poetical Volume

publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: Well now, since the Heat of my Passion's abated,
That the Dean has lampoon'd me, my Mind is elated:
Lampoon'd did I call it────No──What was it then?
What was it? 'Twas Fame to be lash'd by his Pen.
For had he not pointed me out, I had slept till
Ev'n Doom's-day, a poor, insignificant Reptile:
Half Lawyer, half Actor, pert, dull and inglorious,
Obscure and unheard of──but now I'm notorious.
Fame has but two Gates, a white and a black one,
The worst they can say's, I got in at the back one:
If the End be obtain'd, 'tis equal what Portal
I enter, since I'm to be rendred immortal.
So Clysters apply'd to the Anus, 'tis said,
By skillfull Physitians, give ease to the Head.
Tho' my Title be spurious, why shoud I be dastard?
A Man──is a Man──tho' he be but a Bastard.
Why sure?──It's some comfort, that Heroes shoud slay us,
If I fall──I woud fall by the Hand of AEneas:
And who by the Draper, woud not rather damn'd be,
Than Demigodized by Madrigal Nam-by.
A Man is no more, who has once lost his Breath,
But Poets convince us there's Life after Death:
They call from their Graves, the King & the Peasant,
Record our old Deeds, and make what's ceas'd──present;
And when they woud study to set forth a Like,
So the Lines be well drawn, and the Colours but strike,
Whatever the Subject a Coward or Hero,
A Tyrant or Patriot, a Titus or Nero,
To a Iudge it's all one, which he fixes his Eye on,
And a well painted Monkey's as good as a Lion.
The Scriptures affirm, as I heard in my Youth,
For indeed I ne'er read them, for once to speak Truth,
That Death is the Wages of Sin──but the just
Shall not dye, tho' they're laid in the Dust.
They say so──So be it──I care not a Straw
Although I be dead, both in Gospell and Law,
In Verse I shall live and be read in each Climate;
What more can be said of Prime-Serjt and Primate?
While Carter and Pendergast both may be rotten
And damn'd to the bargain and both be forgotten.M551703C
